QuestData.Title: The Tide Turns
QuestData.Description: The time to strike is now. We must take the Tidestone of Golganneth and the Javelin of Suramar is our best chance of piercing the barrier around it.$b$bEvery minute we wait is another minute when the sea can come crashing down on us. What forces we have will be arrayed below, just outside their encampment.$b$bWe will need your strength in addition to the Javelin, $n. We do not have enough forces to take it on our own.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assault the naga camp and seize control of the Tidestone of Golganneth.
